titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress relating to the commemoration of the 180th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and the Kingdom of Thailand.
A resolution expressing the sense of Congress relating to the commemoration of the 180th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and the Kingdom of Thailand.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commemorates: (1) the 180th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the United States and the Kingdom of Thailand, and (2) the 85th birthday of His Majesty King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand.
Congratulates the Kingdom of Thailand and the people of Thailand for their affirmation of democracy.
Looks forward to enduring ties of friendship between the peoples of Thailand and the United States.
